Class ServiceLogin

java.lang.Object
metroMalaga.Controller.ServiceLogin
public class ServiceLogin extends Object
Service class for handling user authentication and data retrieval.

  • Constructor Details

      public ServiceLogin()

  • Method Details

    • authenticateUser

      public boolean authenticateUser(String usuario, String password)
      Authenticates a user by checking the username and verifying the password.
      Parameters:
      usuario - The username.
      password - The plain text password.
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise.

    • getUserData

      public Usuario getUserData(String usuario, String password)
      Retrieves the full user data object, including role and permissions.
      Parameters:
      usuario - The username.
      password - The plain text password (used to populate the user object).
      Returns:
      A Usuario object containing the user's data, or null if retrieval fails.

    • refreshUserData

      public Usuario refreshUserData(Usuario usuario)
      Refresh user data from database (useful when role permissions change).
      Parameters:
      usuario - Usuario object to refresh.
      Returns:
      Updated Usuario object with current database data.
